scripts.dev: npm run build && python3 -m http.server 8080 --directory publish
scripts.build: mkdir -p publish/dist && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=publish/dist/main.js --format=esm --external:react --external:react-dom/* --external:recharts --external:@google/genai --external:firebase/app --external:firebase/auth --external:@revenuecat/purchases-js --log-level=warning && cp index.html publish/ && cp index.css publish/
